abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Fiscal Consolidation and
            competitive Growth Loan for Ecuador was approved by the
            Board on March 10, 2005, but was not signed prior to the
            Closing Date contemplated in the operation's Legal
            Agreement (Article II, Section 2.03). This date was December
            31, 2005. As a result the World Bank proceeded to cancel the
            operation and to notify the Government of Ecuador of such
            cancellation on March 15, 2006.
